Package com.geoloqi.android.sdk.receiver

Class Summary
LQBroadcastReceiver LQBroadcastReceiver is an abstract BroadcastReceiver implementation that can be extended by applications that wish to receive broadcast intents from the location tracker.
LQConnectivityChangeReceiver This class is used to monitor network connectivity changes on the device.
LQDeviceMessagingReceiver This class is a BroadcastReceiver implementation that handles broadcast messages sent from the push messaging service.
 

Enum Summary
LQDeviceMessagingReceiver.C2DMError A collection of GCM/C2DM error codes.
